items.headline: Master the seven basic quality tools for process  improvement using MS Excel | Two case studies included.
objectives_summary: Seven basic quality tools proposed by Ishikawa can solve more than 90% of the quality related problems in an organization.
These tools were orginally proposed in 1970s. Even after more than 50 years these are still relevant.
